>> [  day 1  ]
>>> Hey Soph, you know who it is. This is my new phone.
>>> The old one was stolen last week. Sorry it took a while to replace it. 
>>> But you were saying something about your parents…? 
>> Oh no! I’m so sorry about your phone.  
>> You  got a new one? :O 
>> Ugh mom and dad…it’s the same as usual more lies just to get me to do what they want me to do >.< 
>> You know how it is…but I was thinking… 
>> Maybe…maybe I should run away 
>>> I got the Google Pixel 3a. It’s got some great specs for the price AND 
>>> No. Soph. Stop right there and go play some video games, I know you’ll feel better. 
>> But...
>>> NO. I know what happens once you get an idea in that head of yours. But not this time. Okay? 
>> Okay...
>> [  day 3  ]
>> Hey...what happened?
>> Are you there!?
>> Tell me...tell me when you're back home...
